_header: When whole man is turned into half man
Subjects: death, approach of; sermons, verse in
_description: Warning that death comes fast, in a Latin sermon — two couplets

CULIi38.Transcription:
Wanne holmanis turned in to halfmanþanne comeȝ
                    deȝ fasteþan schal naut longe laste
CULIi38.Note: Formerly foliated as 84v; written as prose.
CULIi38.Editions:
Erb,  Peter C. 
             “Vernacular Material for Preaching in MS Camb. Univ. Lib.
                Ii.III.8.” 
             Mediaeval Studies
         33 (1971): 63-84: 69.
